dialogue.introduction: Hi, thanks for your time, I'm Aoba! Please can I have some words!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Aoba. Advancing into the Truk Islands area, I supported the Pacific Front. With a war correspondent on board, the staff also had reporting as part of their job. At my last moment, I was at Kure. Even without fuel, I did my best!
dialogue.secretary3: Are you interested? I've got some good news, you know?
dialogue.wedding: Aoba, all she really wants to do is look at the Commander rather than the enemy… J-just kidding!
dialogue.show_players_score: Some news? What is it, what is iiiit?
dialogue.equipment1: Okay! I can work better now!
dialogue.equipment2: This'll let me do so much more reporting... ah, no, make fighting easer.
dialogue.supply: Okay! I can work better now!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I seem to have gotten too deeply in the matter.
dialogue.docking_complete: It looks like someone's repairs are completed♪
dialogue.ship_construction: According to the data, there seems to be a new ship launching, yeah?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's back, could I have an interview?
dialogue.attack: The enemy still hasn't noticed us!
dialogue.night_attack: Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
dialogue.mvp: Happy to be of service, thanks again.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Firepower... Is firepower just not enough, I wonder...
dialogue.sunk: Sunk, huh... I wanted to sink at Kure....
